Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the money
Reviews.Author: lhsperry
Reviews.Content: Worked perfect right out of the box.  Could not tell that it was refurbished.  Can't beat the features for the price.but the software was advertisement riddled.  Still getting used to Windows 8 but so far so good.

ProductInfo.Features:
Processor: 2.1GHz up to 3.1GHz AMD Quad-Core A8-5550M Accelerated Processor
RAM: 8GB DDR3L SDRAM (1 DIMM) Maximum supported = 16GB
Hard Drive: 750GB 5400RPM hard drive with HP ProtectSmart Hard Drive Protection
Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 8550G graphics with up to 4204MB total graphics memory
Operating System: Microsoft Windows 8 64-bi
ProductInfo.Name: HP ENVY TouchSmart 15-j009wm AMD Quad-Core A8-5550M 2.10GHz Notebook PC
